Rules.InvariantScript:
// Reference to current datetime
Set(currentTime, Now());
// Set the header text
Set(selectedMonth, Text(currentTime,"mmmm yyyy"));
// Calculate first monday of the first week
Set(firstDay, DateAdd(DateValue(Month(Now()) & "/1/" & Year(Now())),(Weekday(DateValue(Month(Now()) & "/1/" & Year(Now())),StartOfWeek.Monday)-1)*-1,Days));
// Add 6 weeks of days
Set(datesTable,
    Table(
        { Week: 1, Month: Month(firstDay), Day: Day(firstDay),  Selected: false },
        { Week: 1, Month: Month(DateAdd(firstDay,1)), Day: Day(DateAdd(firstDay,1)),  Selected: false },
        { Week: 1, Month: Month(DateAdd(firstDay,2)), Day: Day(DateAdd(firstDay,2)),  Selected: false },
        { Week: 1, Month: Month(DateAdd(firstDay,3)), Day: Day(DateAdd(firstDay,3)),  Selected: false },
        { Week: 1, Month: Month(DateAdd(firstDay,4)), Day: Day(DateAdd(firstDay,4)),  Selected: true },
        { Week: 1, Month: Month(DateAdd(firstDay,5)), Day: Day(DateAdd(firstDay,5)),  Selected: false },
        { Week: 1, Month: Month(DateAdd(firstDay,6)), Day: Day(DateAdd(firstDay,6)),  Selected: true },
        { Week: 2, Month: Month(DateAdd(firstDay,7)), Day: Day(DateAdd(firstDay,7)),  Selected: false },
        { Week: 2, Month: Month(DateAdd(firstDay,8)), Day: Day(DateAdd(firstDay,8)),  Selected: false },

        { Week: 3, Month: Month(DateAdd(firstDay,16)), Day: Day(DateAdd(firstDay,16)),  Selected: false },
        { Week: 3, Month: Month(DateAdd(firstDay,17)), Day: Day(DateAdd(firstDay,17)),  Selected: false },
        { Week: 3, Month: Month(DateAdd(firstDay,18)), Day: Day(DateAdd(firstDay,18)),  Selected: false },
        { Week: 3, Month: Month(DateAdd(firstDay,19)), Day: Day(DateAdd(firstDay,19)),  Selected: false },

        { Week: 4, Month: Month(DateAdd(firstDay,25)), Day: Day(DateAdd(firstDay,25)),  Selected: false },

        { Week: 5, Month: Month(DateAdd(firstDay,33)), Day: Day(DateAdd(firstDay,33)),  Selected: false },
        { Week: 5, Month: Month(DateAdd(firstDay,34)), Day: Day(DateAdd(firstDay,34)),  Selected: false },
        { Week: 6, Month: Month(DateAdd(firstDay,35)), Day: Day(DateAdd(firstDay,35)),  Selected: false },
        { Week: 6, Month: Month(DateAdd(firstDay,36)), Day: Day(DateAdd(firstDay,36)),  Selected: false },
        { Week: 6, Month: Month(DateAdd(firstDay,37)), Day: Day(DateAdd(firstDay,37)),  Selected: false },

        { Week: 6, Month: Month(DateAdd(firstDay,41)), Day: Day(DateAdd(firstDay,41)),  Selected: false }
    )

// Subtract 1 month to the datetime reference
Set(currentTime, DateAdd(currentTime, -1, Months));
// Set the header text
Set(selectedMonth, Text(currentTime,"mmmm yyyy"));
// Calculate first monday of the first week
Set(firstDay, DateAdd(DateValue(Month(currentTime) & "/1/" & Year(currentTime)),(Weekday(DateValue(Month(currentTime) & "/1/" & Year(currentTime)),StartOfWeek.Monday)-1)*-1,Days));
// Add 6 weeks of days
Set(datesTable,
    Table(

// Add 1 month to the datetime reference
Set(currentTime, DateAdd(currentTime, 1, Months));
// Set the header text
Set(selectedMonth, Text(currentTime,"mmmm yyyy"));
// Calculate first monday of the first week
Set(firstDay, DateAdd(DateValue(Month(currentTime) & "/1/" & Year(currentTime)),(Weekday(DateValue(Month(currentTime) & "/1/" & Year(currentTime)),StartOfWeek.Monday)-1)*-1,Days));
// Add 6 weeks of days

    Table(

ControlPropertyState.AutoRuleBindingString: If(Self.Layout = Layout.Horizontal, Min(320, Self.Width - 60), Min(320, Self.Height - 60))
If(Self.Layout = Layout.Horizontal, Min(320, Self.Width - 60), Min(320, Self.Height - 60))

Rules.InvariantScript:
If(
    ThisItem.Month = Month(currentTime),
    Notify(
        Text(ThisItem.Day),
        NotificationType.Information
    )
)

If(
    ThisItem.Month = Month(currentTime),
    If(
        ThisItem.Selected,
        RGBA(
            255,
            255,
            255,
            1
        ),
        RGBA(
            0,
            0,
            0,
            1
        )
    ),
    RGBA(
        204,
        204,
        204,
        1
    )
)

ControlPropertyState.AutoRuleBindingString: If(Self.Layout = Layout.Horizontal, Min(320, Self.Width - 60), Min(320, Self.Height - 60))
